Articles.Content:
Am I missing something, or is the debug toolbar disabled in the 1.0 release? I really wanted to enable the debug to see what temperature parts are at during test flights ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T07:13:06Z" title="04/28/2015 07:13  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by Claw**
Alt-F12, during flight, right? It's totally not working for me. Is there a setting I need to enable or something?
Yep. I have no issues getting it on while in flight. I dont know of any setting you need to turn on.
Alt-F12 seems to be working as normal here. Not sure what could mess that up.
Weird. And frustrating. :| It just won't work for me, fullscreen or windowed. Alt-F12 doesn't seem to do anything.
It is technically MOD+F12 meaning if you are on a mac or Linux it will be different. (right shift for linux and option for mac)

Just found the answer in this thread:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63811-Alt-F12-wont-open-the-debug-toolbar/page2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63811-Alt-F12-wont-open-the-debug-toolbar/page2)

CTRL-alt-F12!
